  1. """Template tags for the ``frequently`` app."""
  2. from django import template
  4. from ..models import EntryCategory
  6. register = template.Library()
  9. @register.inclusion_tag('frequently/partials/category.html')
  10. def render_category(slug):
  11. """Template tag to render a category with all it's entries."""
  12. try:
  13. category = EntryCategory.objects.get(slug=slug)
  14. except EntryCategory.DoesNotExist:
  15. pass
  16. else:
  17. return {'category': category}
  18. return {}
